description:
Gokudo and the others are hypnotized by Ah and Ng, and Lady Nano is abducted!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play Doctor! Here Comes the Magic Sphere!
Oisha-san-gokko de Hougyoku Daisekkin! no Koto
Te puedes acercar mucho a la joya sagrada, jugando a los médicos.
お医者さんゴッコで宝玉大接近! のこと
